name: DBTH Crewneck
description:
Our first original design. 

This is merely a 'fashion' statement, we don't think of the word 'hype' like other people do. Instead, the original meaning and idea of this statement stems from our own inner self. "What's all the hype about?" Hype is what EVERYONE brings up, what everyone talks about. Hype is what people WANT you to immerse yourself in, it's what they want YOU to believe in. Think rumours, idealogies, accusations. Just because everyone talks about it doesn't mean it's right; word goes around - but does that make it the truth? We believe what we choose to believe in, not what people tell us. Don't believe the hype.

(PRE-ORDERS ONLY. THEY ARE EXPECTED TO SHIP CLOSE TO THE END OF MAY!)
